name: Finance Watch
goal:
Finance Watch works to rebalance private and public interest representation, in order for finance to better serve society.

We do this by producing expertise on financial regulation issues in order to strengthen the voice of non-financial service actors in the legislative and regulatory debate.

All expertise produced by Finance Watch is publicly available.
interests: Banking and financial services, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Institutional affairs, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives:
In 2018, Finance Watch works on the following (legislative) initiatives:
- Insurance
­- Better regulation
- Trade agreements
- Brexit
­- Pensions
­- Climate finance (carbon derivatives & green bonds)
- Sustainable finance
- Retail financial services
- FinTech
- Single resolution
- Banking capital requirements
- Insolvency
­- Other Capital Markets Union dossiers

This list of priorities was agreed at our AGM in December 2017. Other ad-hoc issues may be added at the discretion of the secretariat when required.
